Header: Newly-Appointed Security Forces Commander Makes His Maiden Visit to 51 Division
Content: The new Commander Security Forces - Jaffna, Major General Ruwan Wanigasooriya made his maiden field visit to the 51 Division Headquarters in Kopai on Thursday (18). After the Security Forces Commander was warmly welcomed by the General Officer Commanding 51 Division, he was honoured in a Guard Turnout and a parade in accordance with military traditions. Afterwards, Brigadier Lalith Ratnayake, General Officer Commanding, 51 Division presented a comprehensive briefing on the role and tasks of the 51 Division as well as its projects on reconciliation and community welfare. Afterwards, the Security Forces Commander addressed the troops and the gathering of Senior Officers and Staff Officers.
